title: Swarna Pushpa Vaddanam: Golden Floral Waist Belt
materials: meticulously handcrafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster. The floral motifs are designed with embedded gold beads.
features: This exquisite Vaddanam features intricate floral filigree work, a hallmark of traditional South Indian jewelry. Three large floral motifs act as centerpieces, each meticulously detailed. The design incorporates small gold danglers adding a subtle, playful element. Traditional flower designs like malli moggu are woven into the band.
occasions: and other auspicious ceremonies where traditional attire is celebrated. Also suited for festive occasions like Sankranti and Ugadi.
description: A timeless piece showcasing the rich heritage of South Indian craftsmanship. This Vaddanam is not just jewelry; it's an heirloom piece that can be passed down through generations. The detailed filigree work and radiant gold create a regal look, ensuring you stand out at any event. Made with high-quality 22K gold for lasting value and durability.
